responsibilities: Design and implement software solutions to solve complex problems.
Develop and demonstrate disruptive and transformational products as part of an agile development team.
Participate in ideation and product design.
Work directly with business, marketing, and user experience teams.
Be involved in day-to-day decision making on products.
Build and iterate on software prototypes.
Build custom algorithms and dig into data for insights.
skills: Basic knowledge of software engineering languages such as JavaScript (React, Node.js, TypeScript), Python, Java.
Capability to develop on multiple platforms.
Familiarity with software development best practices, including continuous build/integration frameworks, test tools, source code control systems, dependency management tools.
Understanding of agile software development concepts and processes.
Strong oral and written communication skills, including presentation skills.
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment with significant uncertainty.
Strong collaboration, prioritization, and adaptability skills.
qualifications: Working towards a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Computer Information Systems, Informatics, Management Information Systems, Information Technology, Mathematics, or other related technical programs.
Strong technical, analytical, communication, and organizational skills.
Experience with information systems, software applications, and analyzing quantitative information.
Proven track record of academic success.
Fully authorized to work in the U.S. without restrictions.
